alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 1:52AM MST until February 21 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys, and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility on interstate 15 from Monida Pass to Lima.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
